remarks: Convert an operation reverse distributive law to class notation. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 19-Oct-2014.)
statement:
caovdirg.1 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. S /\ y e. S /\ z e. K ) ) -> ( ( x F y ) G z ) = ( ( x G z ) H ( y G z ) ) ) $.
caovdirg $p |- ( ( ph /\ ( A e. S /\ B e. S /\ C e. K ) ) -> ( ( A F B ) G C ) = ( ( A G C ) H ( B G C ) ) ) $.
$d A x y z $.
$d B x y z $.
$d C x y z $.
$d F x y z $.
$d G x y z $.
$d H x y z $.
$d K x y z $.
$d S x y z $.
$d ph x y z $.
$d x y z $.
$d x y z $.
$d x y z $.
